dotnet.new:
you can create a new project from CMD, using dotnet
dotnet new [template]
replace [template] with a actual template, like "console", "class library", etc if you dont wanna use top level statements, you can use that:
dotnet new [template] --use-program-main
dotnet.sln:
When you create a new project using the above, it doesnt create a .sln for you so, you need to use that:
dotnet new sln
you can also name it
dotnet new sln --name my_file
